Operator details¶

Basic arithmetic¶

x:Num y:Num # – power/exponentiation¶

Finds x raised to the power of y.

5 3 #   ->  125
2 .5 #  ->  1.4142135623730951
0 0 #   ->  1

Logical operations¶

Any ! – boolean “not”¶

Return 0 if the element is truthy, otherwise 1.

5 !      ->  0
"abc" !  ->  0
[1 0] !  ->  0
0 !      ->  1
"" !     ->  1
Tip: !! can be used to give the truthiness of an element.
